title: Periodic Table: Is Boron a Group 3 or Group 13 element? - Quora

response.answer_text: Group III elements is because that’s how electrons and valencies and stuff works, in the first three periods. Group 13 is because you have a gap of ten elements that is filled-in in the remaining four periods. It just depends on how they’re counting things. If they skip 10 or not.
